'''Fairmarket''' is a town in [[the Riverlands]], the region controlled by [[House Tully]] of [[Riverrun]]. The town is located besides the Blue Fork of [[the Trident]] and north of the Red Fork, southeast of [[Wendish Town]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, while en route to [[the Twins]], [[Robb Stark]] sends scouts to Fairmarket to see if he could cross the Blue Fork there, but they find the wooden bridge washed out.
sections.History:
===[[Season 4]]===
As [[Sandor Clegane]] and [[Arya Stark]] make their way back through the Riverlands, traveling southeast from [[The Twins|the Twins]] to enter [[The Vale of Arryn|the Vale of Arrynn]] at the [[Bloody Gate]], they stop at a stream and she asks where they are.  Sandor replies that he thinks they are near Fairmarket.<ref>"[[Breaker of Chains]]"</ref>
